BatchSize.description: The upper size of the batch to write.  When this number is reached, all items will be written for the given type.
BatchSize.title: Batch Size

RequestsTableName.description: The name of the table that is used for requests.
RequestsTableName.title: Requests Table Name

ResponsesTableName.description: The name of the table that is used for responses.
ResponsesTableName.title: Response Table Name

TraceLogLevel.description: The trace log level.  Verbose = 0, Debug = 1, Information = 2, Warning = 3, Error = 4, Fatal = 5
TraceLogLevel.title: Trace Log Level

TraceTableName.description: The name of the table that is used for traces.
TraceTableName.title: The Tracetablename Schema
